update tb_party
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profiles = #{profiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
watch = #{watchNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
star = #{starNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
good_num = #{goodNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
forward_num = #{forwardNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_party set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profiles = #{profiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, watch_num = #{watchNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, star_num = #{starNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, good_num = #{goodNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, forward_num = #{forwardNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_imgae = #{detailImgae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_party
star_num =star_num+ #{starNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
good_num =good_num+ #{goodNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
forward_num = forward_num+#{forwardNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
watch_num = watch_num+#{watchNum},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*,IFNULL(b.star ,0) as star_status,IFNULL(b.good ,0) as good_status from tb_party as a LEFT JOIN tb_user_star as b on a.id =b.community_id and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where a.del_flag = 0 order by a.good_num desc

select
from tb_party where del_flag = 0 order by good_num desc limit #{limit}
